summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GENTURIX iteration 3 features - Multi-Tenant APIs, RRHH module unification, route redirects, and panic button with 3 emergency types. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Auth login returns condominium_id field (admin, guard, resident)
GET /api/security/panic-events - Guards can view panic events
RRHH module loads with 'Recursos Humanos' title
RRHH module contains 'Planificación de Turnos' submódulo
ResidentUI shows 3 panic buttons (Medical/RED, Suspicious/AMBER, General/ORANGE)
Panic button click sends alert and shows success screen
Success screen shows guards notified count
BottomNav (mobile) shows 'RRHH' not 'Turnos' as separate item
Guard UI displays active emergency alerts with correct colors
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_ prefixed condominiums for multi-tenant testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-tenant architecture fully implemented. RRHH module is the central HR module containing Turnos as a submódulo. Legacy routes /hr and /shifts redirect to /rrhh. Panic button has 3 emergency types with psychological color coding (Medical=RED, Suspicious=AMBER, General=ORANGE). Pricing model is $1/user/month.
